sentences.sContent: a measure intended to forestall further attacks
sentences.sCn: 意在预先阻止进一步攻击的措施

synos.tran: 垄断；预先阻止；占先一步

remMethod.val: fore(前面) + stall(停止) → 预先阻止

trans.tranCn: 预先阻止， 先发制人
trans.tranOther: to prevent something from happening or prevent someone from doing something by doing something first
